isis.stitle: AIR COMPRESSOR: MIDLAND MODELS EL-1300 AND EL-1600 - ASSEMBLE - CYLINDER HEAD TO CYLINDER BLOCK

svcproc.title: CYLINDER HEAD TO CYLINDER BLOCK
svcproc.para: Position new cylinder head gasket on cylinder block. With gasket aligned, position cylinder head on block. Insert the longest head bolt through the unloader cover center hole; the other five head bolts through the remaining holes. Tighten head bolts in the sequence noted in Figure 18. This is a two step process: first, tighten to the first torque value of 18 - 22 ft-lbs. (24.4 - 29.8 N•m); retighten second value of 27 - 33 ft-lbs. (36.6 - 44.7 N•m).

figure.caption: Figure 18. Sequence For Tightening Head Bolts

svcproc.para: Tighten unloader cover bolts to 100-150 in-lbs. (11.2 - 16.9 N•m) after tightening the head bolts.
